analysis.Summary: This file exports a factory function that generates a Vue Router route configuration object for the "rents" module. It defines three child routes (list, create, edit) with internationalized titles, dynamic component imports, and access-control middleware.
analysis.Purpose: To encapsulate and centralize the routing definitions for the rents feature in the application, making it easy to mount under a given prefix or base path.

Components.name: createRentsRoutes
Components.responsibility: Primary factory that builds and returns the route object for the rents module.

Components.name: nameWithPrefix
Components.responsibility: Helper to prepend an optional prefix to route names.

Components.name: Rents.vue
Components.responsibility: Page component for listing all rents.

Components.name: RentsEdit.vue
Components.responsibility: Page component for creating or editing a rent.

Functions.name: createRentsRoutes

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Optional string to prepend to each route name.

Functions.returns: An object representing a Vue Router route with path, meta, and children definitions.
Functions.description: Builds the main route and its child routes for listing, creating, and editing rents.

Functions.name: nameWithPrefix

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The base name of the route.

Functions.description: If a prefix was provided, returns `${prefix}${name}`, otherwise returns `name`.

Dependencies.description: Provides `requiresAccess` middleware to guard routes based on user permissions.
Vue component for the rents list page.
Vue component for the rent create/edit page.

analysis.Usage: Typically imported into a higher-level router index (e.g. `modules/rents/views/router/index.js`) and invoked as `createRentsRoutes('SomePrefix', { basePath: 'custom-rents' })` to be added to the Vue Router's routes array.
Notes: Uses webpackChunkName 'Renting' to group dynamic imports into a single chunk.
Each route has `beforeEnter` guards enforcing read/create/edit permissions via `validationOwnership.requiresAccess`.
Meta objects include localized titles for English and Russian.
The `basePath` option allows overriding the default `'rents'` path segment.
